attributes.action: Provide clarity on how exams will be affected by the coronavirus for A levels.
attributes.background: Help make it clear to A level students going to University this September how the ever growing threat of coronavirus will affect them and their peers, what measures will be put in place to ensure no student is put at a loss.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
